Package arcade.core.sim.output

Class OutputSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.core.sim.output.OutputSaver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatchOutputSaver, PottsOutputSaver
    public abstract class OutputSaver
extends java.lang.Object
implements sim.engine.Steppable
    Custom saver for serializing objects to JSON.

    The saver is associated with an implementation-specific Gson instance that defines serialization of implementation-specific classes. The associated Series instance is used to save static information specific to the series. The equipped Simulation instance is called to get cells / locations that are saved at a given tick.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • format

        protected static java.lang.String format​(java.lang.String string,
                                         int maxElements)
        Formats the arrays in the given string.

        Method reformats the output of GSON pretty printing by converting [\n A,\n B,\n ... N\n ] to [ A, B, ..., N ] for lists of up to N elements.

        Parameters:
        string - the string to format
        maxElements - the maximum number of elements to format.
        Returns:
        the formatted string
